metadata.title: CVE-2017-15046 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: LAME 3.99.5, 3.99.4, 3.98.4, 3.98.2, 3.98 and 3.97 have a stack-based buffer overflow in unpack_read_samples in frontend/get_audio.c, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-9412.

criterions.comment: lame package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
